# Shrine (Building)
## Overview
**Shrine**

**Create** 3 Goods, 1 Influence, 4 Labor, 1 Magic (270 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Altar (Room)|Altar]], 1 [[Statue (Room)|Statue]]

A shrine, idol, sacred grove, or similar holy site.
